name: Inarius's Perseverance
flavorText: When the power of the nephalem became a threat, Inarius sought to have them weakened at any cost.
flavorTextHtml: When the power of the nephalem became a threat, Inarius sought to have them weakened at any cost.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Bone Armor damage is increased by 1000%.(4) Set:     
 Bone Armor grants an additional 3% damage reduction per enemy hit.(6) Set:     
 Bone Armor also activates a swirling tornado of bone, damaging nearby enemies for 1000% weapon damage and increasing the damage they take from the Necromancer by 10,000%.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Bone Armor damage is increased by 1000%.
(4) Set:
Bone Armor grants an additional 3% damage reduction per enemy hit.
(6) Set:
Bone Armor also activates a swirling tornado of bone, damaging nearby enemies for 1000% weapon damage and increasing the damage they take from the Necromancer by 10,000%.
